mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post(member_id, board_id, category_id, subject, content, view_count, create_at, deleted, pinned) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{boardId}, #{categoryId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{viewCount}, #{createAt}, #{deleted}, #{pinned})
mapper.select:
SELECT p.id, c.name AS categoryName, p.subject, m.name AS writerName, p.pinned as pinned,
-- 썸네일 파일명 (예: 대표 첨부파일 1개만) (SELECT pf.saved_filename FROM post_file pf WHERE pf.post_id = p.id ORDER BY pf.id ASC LIMIT 1) AS thumbnailFilename,
-- 댓글 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE post_id = p.id) AS commentCount,
-- 첨부파일 수 (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_file pf WHERE pf.post_id = p.id) AS fileCount,
p.view_count AS viewCount, p.create_at AS createAt
FROM post p JOIN category c ON p.category_id = c.id JOIN member m ON p.member_id = m.id WHERE p.board_id = #{boardId} AND p.pinned = true
ORDER BY p.id DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET subject = #{deletedSubject}, content = #{deletedContent}, deleted = true WHERE id = #{postId}
